caption: Most people know us for building some of the best truck mounted attenuators (TMAs) in the industry. 💪🚧 But did you know… we also build thermoplastic trucks? That’s right! we’re not just protecting work zones, we’re helping mark and maintain them too. From safety to striping, we’re proud to support the full scope of roadway operations. If you haven’t seen what our thermoplastic trucks can do, now’s a great time to take a closer look. Same quality. Same reliability. Just another way we help keep roads safer and more efficient.
comments: That’s a good looking truck!

caption: "I don't think I should be on the Jr. Case Pool Team, why did you choose me?" is what I asked a week before 's INSPIRE Case Competition happened. Here's my journey from not knowing what a case competition even was, to winning my first case competition (and the struggles I faced). Feel free to give it a read and tell me your thoughts!
comments: Well written Rose! I’m proud that you pushed yourself through doubts. Looking forward to seeing you continue to compete for TMA!

I could not think of someone more deserving of this position, your constant dedication to putting yourself out there, challenging yourself and never settling on mediocrity are some of your most prominent qualities. Congratulations rose you did amazing.

Congratulations Rose! So well deserved and not a suprise, especially after seeing how passionate and how hard you worked! I loved reading about your case competition journey! I can’t wait to see what else you’ll achieve!!

Congratulations Rose! I'm glad to be your mentor and grateful to have you as my mentee. Whether it's attending events or participating in case competitions, you're always making a significant impact. I'm incredibly proud of you and I can't wait to see your accomplishments in the future!
Congrats Rose!! You did so well and I can’t wait to see what else you’ll accomplish. Incredibly proud of you 💙
What a great read Rose - I love to see it!
Genuinely amazed at how you felt the courage to continue to explore this interest! So proud of how far you’ve come at such a short time, can’t think of anyone more deserving of this opportunity!!
I genuinely enjoyed reading this Rose! I’m super proud of this amazing achievement and hearing about your journey. Look forward to seeing what you do next, you will do amazing things :)
Congratulations Rose! This is just amazing👏
Wow! What a beautiful journey, and it’s only the beginning. Your commitment and dedication is truly a testament to excellence. I’m looking forward to seeing more of your accomplishments!!
Congratulations Rose! Always great to see you accomplish such achievements!
Your willingess to learn and grow coupled with your passion for the industry makes for great qualities. Congratulations Rose!

Great post Rose! Absolutely loved how you were open and vulnerable when writing it. Your genuine passion for case competition and your drive to do well is explicit. It was wonderful being on a team with you and I look forward to the next ones!

Well said Rose! I definitely relate to the nerves and imposter syndrome associated with your first case competition. Just remember that we all start somewhere and trying new things is the best way to grow. Glad to have you on the team, the tenacity and energy you bring is invaluable!
Great job to you and the team, looking forward to another strong performance at BUAC

I’m so proud of you Rose!! 👏🏽For the moment I saw you creating a cirlce outside of TedPack Leader training I knew you were going to do big things. This is only the start, and I can’t see what else you accomplish at TRSM and beyond. You’re a great inspiration :)
Congratulations Rose! A well-deserved win🥇
Imposter syndrome didn’t stand a chance🏆💡
Congrats!! 🎉
Congratulations Rose! I couldn’t imagine a better fit for Jr. Case Pool. I know you’re going to do amazing in this position, as well as in your future endeavours.
